meta.id_convention: lowercase, no spaces; duplicates disambiguated with numeric suffix and/or lineage tag
meta.notes: Template for all 12 sons of Jacob, tribal structures, and descendants.

reuben.label: Reuben
reuben.notes: Firstborn of Jacob; loses firstborn rights.

levi.label: Levi
levi.notes: Priestly line; no territorial allotment except cities.

joseph.label: Joseph
joseph.notes: House of Joseph; tribe branches expressed as Ephraim and Manasseh.

ephraim.label: Ephraim
ephraim.notes: Branch tribe of Joseph; leading name of the northern kingdom.

abraham.name: Abraham
abraham.notes: Ancestor of Israel; included for upstream context.

leah.name: Leah
leah.notes: Mother of Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar, Zebulun, and Dinah.

bilhah.name: Bilhah
bilhah.notes: Rachel’s handmaid; mother of Dan and Naphtali.

zilpah.name: Zilpah
zilpah.notes: Leah’s handmaid; mother of Gad and Asher.

dinah.name: Dinah
dinah.notes: Daughter of Jacob and Leah. By biblical exegesis, identified as the mother of Asenath, which places Asenath and her sons Manasseh and Ephraim back into the house of Israel through Leah.

joseph.name: Joseph
joseph.notes: Head of the House of Joseph.

asenath.name: Asenath
asenath.notes: Daughter of Dinah by biblical exegesis, brought into Egypt and joined to Joseph. She is the wife of Joseph and the mother of Manasseh and Ephraim, binding their line back into Jacob and Leah’s house.

machir.name: Machir
machir.notes: Son of Manasseh; father of Gilead; progenitor of the Machirites.

gilead.name: Gilead
gilead.notes: Namesake of the region Gilead; descendant of Machir.

hepher.name: Hepher
hepher.notes: Father of Zelophehad; Manassite sub-clan head.

zelophehad.name: Zelophehad
zelophehad.notes: Manassite with no sons; his daughters’ petition establishes inheritance rights for daughters in Israel.

mahlah.name: Mahlah
mahlah.notes: One of Zelophehad’s daughters and co-heiress.

noah.name: Noah
noah.notes: One of Zelophehad’s daughters and co-heiress.

hoglah.name: Hoglah
hoglah.notes: One of Zelophehad’s daughters and co-heiress.

milcah.name: Milcah
milcah.notes: One of Zelophehad’s daughters and co-heiress.

tirzah.name: Tirzah
tirzah.notes: One of Zelophehad’s daughters; later also a royal city name.

ashriel.name: Ashriel (Asriel)
ashriel.notes: Ancestor of the Ashrielites; Manasseh branch.

shemida.name: Shemida
shemida.notes: Ancestor of Ahian, Shechem, Likhi, Aniam.

shechem.name: Shechem
shechem.notes: Manassite descendant; not the prince of Genesis 34.

peresh.name: Peresh
peresh.notes: Son of Machir by Maachah; brother of Sheresh.

sheresh.name: Sheresh
sheresh.notes: Son of Machir; brother of Peresh.

bedan.name: Bedan
bedan.notes: Linked in some traditions to the Bedan of 1 Samuel 12:11.

hammoleketh.name: Hammoleketh
hammoleketh.notes: Sister of Machir; mother of Ishod, Abiezer, and Mahalah.

abiezer.name: Abiezer
abiezer.notes: Ancestor of the Abiezrites; Gideon’s clan.

mahalah.name: Mahalah
mahalah.notes: Son in the line of Hammoleketh; distinct from Mahlah daughter of Zelophehad.

shuthelah_i.name: Shuthelah (I)
shuthelah_i.notes: First Shuthelah in Ephraim’s line; head of the Shuthalhites.

bered.name: Bered
bered.notes: Possibly identical with Becher in Numbers 26:35.

tahath_i.name: Tahath (I)
tahath_i.notes: First Tahath in the Ephraimite chain.

tahath_ii.name: Tahath (II)
tahath_ii.notes: Second Tahath in the Ephraimite chain.

ezer.name: Ezer
ezer.notes: Ephraimite slain by men of Gath.

elead.name: Elead
elead.notes: Ephraimite slain by men of Gath alongside Ezer.

beriah.name: Beriah
beriah.notes: Born after the tragedy in Ephraim’s house; name signifies calamity.

sheerah.name: Sheerah
sheerah.notes: Builds Lower and Upper Beth-horon and Uzzen-sheerah.

rephah.name: Rephah
rephah.notes: Ephraimite link in the Beriah chain.

resheph.name: Resheph
resheph.notes: Name associated elsewhere with fire/plague imagery; here an Ephraimite link.

telah.name: Telah
telah.notes: Part of the Ephraimite chain from Beriah to Joshua.

ammihud.name: Ammihud
ammihud.notes: Father of Elishama; 'my kinsman is God'.

elishama.name: Elishama
elishama.notes: Prince of Ephraim in the wilderness censuses.

joshua.name: Joshua
joshua.notes: Successor to Moses; Moses called him completes the Joseph–Ephraim arc by burying Joseph’s bones at Shechem.

becher.name: Becher
becher.notes: Clan ancestor of the Bachrites; possibly identical with Bered.

eran.name: Eran
eran.notes: Ancestor of the Eranites; sub-line from Shuthelah.

er_judah.name: Er (Judah)
er_judah.notes: Firstborn of Judah; slain for wickedness.

onan_judah.name: Onan (Judah)
onan_judah.notes: Second son of Judah; slain for refusing levirate duty.

shelah_judah.name: Shelah (Judah)
shelah_judah.notes: Youngest son of Judah by the daughter of Shua; ancestor of later Judahite clans.

er_shelah.name: Er (Shelah line)
er_shelah.notes: Er is identified as the father of Lecah; part of the Shelah branch within Judah.

lecah.name: Lecah
lecah.notes: Son of Er of the Shelah line.

laadah.name: Laadah
laadah.notes: Laadah is named as the father of Mareshah in the Shelah genealogy.

mareshah_shelah.name: Mareshah (Shelah line)
mareshah_shelah.notes: This Mareshah belongs to the Shelah branch and is distinct from Mareshah under Caleb in 1 Chronicles 2.

linen_workers_shelah.name: Families of the linen workers
linen_workers_shelah.notes: Described as 'the families of the house of them that wrought fine linen'; occupational Judahite clan under Shelah.

jokim.name: Jokim
jokim.notes: Listed in association with Shelah’s genealogical cluster; no father is given in the biblical text.

men_of_chozeba.name: Men of Chozeba
men_of_chozeba.notes: Group mentioned within Shelah’s Judahite registry; father not provided.

joash_shelah.name: Joash (Shelah line)
joash_shelah.notes: Joash is listed under the Shelah branch but without lineage details.

saraph.name: Saraph
saraph.notes: Listed with Shelah’s descendants; associated with ruling Moab and returning to Lehem.

jashubi_lehem.name: Jashubi-lehem
jashubi_lehem.notes: A name tied to the Shelah cluster; father unknown.

potters_netaim.name: Potters of Netaim
potters_netaim.notes: Potter families living at Netaim; tied to the Shelah line by context.

potters_gederah.name: Potters of Gederah
potters_gederah.notes: Potter families dwelling in Gederah; connected to Shelah’s descendants.

perez.name: Perez
perez.notes: Twin son of Judah by Tamar; his line becomes the royal Judah backbone.

zerah.name: Zerah
zerah.notes: Twin of Perez, marked by the scarlet thread; father of notable clans.

hezron_judah.name: Hezron (Judah)
hezron_judah.notes: Son of Perez; father of Jerahmeel, Ram, and Caleb (Hezron’s son).

zimri_zerah.name: Zimri (son of Zerah)
zimri_zerah.notes: Listed among Zerah’s sons; possibly linked to the Achan line.

ethan_zerah.name: Ethan (son of Zerah)
ethan_zerah.notes: One of Zerah’s sons; associated with wisdom traditions in later texts.

heman_zerah.name: Heman (son of Zerah)
heman_zerah.notes: Zerahite; name echoed in Levitical musician Heman.

calcol_zerah.name: Calcol (son of Zerah)
calcol_zerah.notes: Zerahite listed among wise men; associated with coastal or trading clans.

dara_zerah.name: Dara (son of Zerah)
dara_zerah.notes: Zerahite; variant name Darda appears in 1 Kings 4:31 in wisdom comparison.

carmi_zerah.name: Carmi (Zerah line)
carmi_zerah.notes: Son of Zimri/Zabdi in the Zerahite line of Judah; father of Achan.

achan.name: Achan
achan.notes: Zerahite from the tribe of Judah whose sin at Jericho (taking ḥērem) causes the breach and judgment on Israel.

jerahmeel.name: Jerahmeel
jerahmeel.notes: Firstborn of Hezron; ancestor of Jerahmeelites in the Negev.

ram_judah.name: Ram (Judah line)
ram_judah.notes: Hezron’s son; ancestor in the Davidic royal line.

caleb_hezron.name: Caleb (son of Hezron)
caleb_hezron.notes: Judahite ancestor distinct from Caleb son of Jephunneh; linked to Hebron/Bethlehem lines.

amminadab.name: Amminadab
amminadab.notes: Father of Nahshon; Judahite ancestor in priestly marriage alliances (Aaron’s wife Elisheba).

nahshon.name: Nahshon
nahshon.notes: Prince of the children of Judah in the wilderness.

salmon.name: Salmon
salmon.notes: Father of Boaz in the Judahite royal line; associated with the Rahab tradition in Matthew.

boaz.name: Boaz
boaz.notes: Wealthy Judahite of Bethlehem; kinsman-redeemer who fathers Obed by Ruth.

obed.name: Obed
obed.notes: Son born to Boaz and Ruth; father of Jesse.

jesse.name: Jesse
jesse.notes: Father of David; Bethlehemite; the 'root' or 'stem' used in prophetic imagery.

eliab_jesse.name: Eliab (son of Jesse)
eliab_jesse.notes: Jesse’s firstborn; tall and impressive but passed over for kingship.

abinadab_jesse.name: Abinadab (son of Jesse)
abinadab_jesse.notes: One of Jesse’s sons presented to Samuel; distinct from other Abinadabs in Scripture.

shimea_jesse.name: Shimea (son of Jesse)
shimea_jesse.notes: Another of Jesse’s sons; appears with name variants across Samuel and Chronicles.

nethanel_jesse.name: Nethanel (son of Jesse)
nethanel_jesse.notes: One of Jesse’s sons listed only in Chronicles.

raddai_jesse.name: Raddai (son of Jesse)
raddai_jesse.notes: Another son of Jesse named only in Chronicles.

ozem_jesse.name: Ozem (son of Jesse)
ozem_jesse.notes: One of Jesse’s sons; David’s older brother.

david.name: David
david.notes: Shepherd, anointed king of Israel; anchor of the Judahite royal line.

ram_jerahmeel.name: Ram (son of Jerahmeel)
ram_jerahmeel.notes: Firstborn of Jerahmeel son of Hezron; not the same Ram as in the Davidic line.

oren_judah.name: Oren (Judah)
oren_judah.notes: Son of Jerahmeel; distinguished from any other Oren by tribal context.

ozem_jerahmeel.name: Ozem (son of Jerahmeel)
ozem_jerahmeel.notes: Son of Jerahmeel; distinct from Ozem son of Jesse.

atarah.name: Atarah
atarah.notes: Second wife of Jerahmeel; mother of Onam.

maaz.name: Maaz
maaz.notes: Son of Ram son of Jerahmeel.

jamin_jerahmeel.name: Jamin (son of Ram, Jerahmeel line)
jamin_jerahmeel.notes: Son of Ram son of Jerahmeel; distinguished from other Jamins by lineage tag.

eker.name: Eker
eker.notes: Son of Ram son of Jerahmeel.

shammai_onam.name: Shammai (son of Onam)
shammai_onam.notes: Son of Onam in the Jerahmeel branch.

jada.name: Jada
jada.notes: Brother of Shammai; his line includes Jether and Jonathan.

nadab_judah.name: Nadab (Jerahmeel branch)
nadab_judah.notes: Son of Shammai son of Onam.

abishur.name: Abishur
abishur.notes: Son of Shammai son of Onam.

abihail.name: Abihail
abihail.notes: Wife of Abishur; mother of Ahban and Molid.

appaim.name: Appaim
appaim.notes: Son of Nadab; father of Ishi.

ishi_judah.name: Ishi (Jerahmeel branch)
ishi_judah.notes: Son of Appaim; father of Sheshan.

sheshan.name: Sheshan
sheshan.notes: Man of Judah with no sons; his line continues through his daughter and Jarha the Egyptian.

ahlai.name: Ahlai
ahlai.notes: Daughter of Sheshan; named in the context of his line lacking sons.

jarha.name: Jarha
jarha.notes: Egyptian servant to Sheshan; receives Sheshan’s daughter in marriage and carries on the line.

attai.name: Attai
attai.notes: Son of Jarha by Sheshan’s daughter; first in the mixed Sheshan–Jarha line.

nathan_attai.name: Nathan (son of Attai)
nathan_attai.notes: Son of Attai; beginning of a long post-Sheshan chain.

zabad_attai.name: Zabad (Sheshan line)
zabad_attai.notes: Son of Nathan son of Attai; not to be confused with other Zabads elsewhere.

ephlal.name: Ephlal
ephlal.notes: Son of Zabad in the Jarha–Sheshan line.

obed_sheshan.name: Obed (Sheshan line)
obed_sheshan.notes: Obed in the Jarha–Sheshan line; distinct from Obed son of Boaz.

jehu_judah.name: Jehu (Jerahmeel branch)
jehu_judah.notes: Part of the extended Sheshan line.

azariah_sheshan.name: Azariah (Sheshan line)
azariah_sheshan.notes: Son of Jehu in the Jerahmeel/Sheshan branch.

helez_sheshan.name: Helez (Sheshan line)
helez_sheshan.notes: Son of Azariah in the Sheshan line.

eleasah_sheshan.name: Eleasah (Sheshan line)
eleasah_sheshan.notes: Son of Helez in the Sheshan line.

sismai.name: Sismai
sismai.notes: Son of Eleasah in the Sheshan line.

shallum_sheshan.name: Shallum (Sheshan line)
shallum_sheshan.notes: Son of Sismai in the Sheshan line.

jekamiah.name: Jekamiah
jekamiah.notes: Son of Shallum in the Sheshan line.

elishama_sheshan.name: Elishama (Sheshan line)
elishama_sheshan.notes: Final named descendant of the Sheshan–Jarha line.

jether_jada.name: Jether (son of Jada)
jether_jada.notes: Son of Jada brother of Shammai; died childless.

jonathan_jada.name: Jonathan (son of Jada)
jonathan_jada.notes: Son of Jada; father of Peleth and Zaza.

peleth_judah.name: Peleth (Jerahmeel branch)
peleth_judah.notes: Son of Jonathan in the Jada branch.

zaza.name: Zaza
zaza.notes: Son of Jonathan in the Jada branch.

azubah.name: Azubah
azubah.notes: First wife of Caleb son of Hezron.

jerioth.name: Jerioth
jerioth.notes: Second wife associated with Caleb son of Hezron; the sons listed are described as hers.

jesher.name: Jesher
jesher.notes: Son of Caleb son of Hezron by Azubah.

shobab_caleb.name: Shobab (Caleb line)
shobab_caleb.notes: Son of Caleb son of Hezron by Azubah; distinct from other Shobab references.

ardon_caleb.name: Ardon (Caleb line)
ardon_caleb.notes: Son of Caleb son of Hezron by Azubah.

ephrath.name: Ephrath
ephrath.notes: Wife of Caleb son of Hezron; mother of Hur; linked to Bethlehem/Ephrathite geography.

hur_caleb.name: Hur (Caleb line)
hur_caleb.notes: Son of Caleb by Ephrath; ancestor of Bethlehem and key Judahite families.

uri.name: Uri
uri.notes: Son of Hur; father of Bezalel.

bezalel.name: Bezalel
bezalel.notes: Skilled craftsman filled with the spirit of God; chief artisan for the tabernacle; Judahite from Hur’s line.

mesha_caleb.name: Mesha (Caleb line)
mesha_caleb.notes: Described as firstborn of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel; father of Ziph.

ziph_caleb.name: Ziph (Caleb line)
ziph_caleb.notes: Son of Mesha; his name links to the region of Ziph in Judah.

mareshah.name: Mareshah
mareshah.notes: Calebite associated with the town of Mareshah.

hebron_person.name: Hebron (person)
hebron_person.notes: Descendant of Mareshah; linked to the Calebite Hebron line (distinct from the city only).

korah_hebron.name: Korah (Hebron line)
korah_hebron.notes: Son of Hebron in the Caleb branch.

tappuah_hebron.name: Tappuah (Hebron line)
tappuah_hebron.notes: Son of Hebron in the Caleb branch.

rekem_hebron.name: Rekem (Hebron line)
rekem_hebron.notes: Son of Hebron; his line continues to Shammai.

shema_hebron.name: Shema (Hebron line)
shema_hebron.notes: Son of Hebron; his line runs through Raham.

raham.name: Raham
raham.notes: Son of Shema; father of Jorkeam.

shammai_rekem.name: Shammai (Rekem line)
shammai_rekem.notes: Son of Rekem; his sons are Maon and others in Hebron’s cluster.

maon.name: Maon
maon.notes: Son of Shammai; ancestor of Beth-zur.

bethzur.name: Beth-zur (person)
bethzur.notes: Personified ancestor associated with the town of Beth-zur.

shobal.name: Shobal
shobal.notes: Son of Hur; father of Kiriath-jearim in the Caleb/Bethlehem structure.

salma.name: Salma
salma.notes: Son of Hur; called the father of Bethlehem, crucial for mapping Bethlehem as a Calebite/Ephrathite center.

hareph.name: Hareph
hareph.notes: Son of Hur; described as the father of Beth-gader.

reaiah_shobal.name: Reaiah (son of Shobal)
reaiah_shobal.notes: Described as the father of half of the Menuhoth from Shobal’s line at Kiriath-jearim.

menuhoth_half.name: Half of the Menuhoth
menuhoth_half.notes: Collective ancestor node representing half of the Menuhoth clan derived from Reaiah son of Shobal.

ithrites_kiriath.name: Ithrites (families of Kirjath-jearim)
ithrites_kiriath.notes: Listed as one of the 'families of Kirjath-jearim' under Shobal.

puthites_kiriath.name: Puthites (families of Kirjath-jearim)
puthites_kiriath.notes: Listed as one of the 'families of Kirjath-jearim' under Shobal.

shumathites_kiriath.name: Shumathites (families of Kirjath-jearim)
shumathites_kiriath.notes: Listed as one of the 'families of Kirjath-jearim' under Shobal.

mishraites_kiriath.name: Mishraites (families of Kirjath-jearim)
mishraites_kiriath.notes: Families of Kirjath-jearim under Shobal; 'of them came the Zorathites and the Eshtaolites'.

zorathites_mishraites.name: Zorathites (from Mishraites)
zorathites_mishraites.notes: Described as coming from the Mishraite families of Kirjath-jearim: 'of them came the Zorathites…'.

eshtaolites_mishraites.name: Eshtaolites (from Mishraites)
eshtaolites_mishraites.notes: Described as coming from the Mishraite families of Kirjath-jearim: 'of them came… the Eshtaolites'.

bethlehem_salma.name: Bethlehem (sons of Salma)
bethlehem_salma.notes: Named among the 'sons of Salma': Bethlehem. Represents the Bethlehemite families descended from Salma son of Hur in Judah.

netophathites_salma.name: Netophathites (sons of Salma)
netophathites_salma.notes: Named among the 'sons of Salma': the Netophathites. Represents Netophathite families under Salma.

ataroth_beth_joab.name: Ataroth-beth-joab (sons of Salma)
ataroth_beth_joab.notes: Ancestor/place-node associated with the families of Ataroth-beth-joab under Salma.

half_manahathites_salma.name: Half of the Manahathites (sons of Salma)
half_manahathites_salma.notes: Explicitly called 'half of the Manahathites' among the sons of Salma.

zorites_salma.name: Zorites (sons of Salma)
zorites_salma.notes: Named as 'the Zorites' in the list of the sons of Salma; represents the Zorite families under Salma.

tirathites_jabez.name: Tirathites (scribes at Jabez)
tirathites_jabez.notes: One of the families of the scribes who dwelt at Jabez. These are identified as Kenites who came from Hammath, father of the house of Rechab.

shimeathites_jabez.name: Shimeathites (scribes at Jabez)
shimeathites_jabez.notes: One of the families of the scribes who dwelt at Jabez, identified with the Kenites from Hammath.

sucathites_jabez.name: Sucathites (scribes at Jabez)
sucathites_jabez.notes: One of the families of the scribes who dwelt at Jabez, counted among the Kenites from Hammath.

hammath_kenite.name: Hammath (Kenite)
hammath_kenite.notes: Kenite ancestor described as the father of the house of Rechab; linked to the scribe families at Jabez.

house_of_rechab.name: House of Rechab
house_of_rechab.notes: The house of Rechab, a Kenite line said to come from Hammath and associated with the Jabez scribes.
